mapper.select: select * from mtime_film_t where film_score >= 8.5 and film_status = #{status}

select UUID as filmId,film_type as filmType,img_address as imgAddress,film_name as filmName,film_score as filmScore from mtime_film_t where film_score >= 8.5 and film_status = #{status} order by film_score desc

select UUID as filmId,film_type as filmType,img_address as imgAddress,film_name as filmName,film_preSaleNum as expectNum,film_time as showTime from mtime_film_t where film_status = #{status} order by film_time
select UUID as filmId,img_address as imgAddress,film_name as filmName,film_box_office as boxNum from mtime_film_t where film_status = 1 order by film_box_office desc
select UUID as filmId,img_address as imgAddress,film_name as filmName,film_preSaleNum as expectNum from mtime_film_t where film_status = 2 order by film_preSaleNum desc
select UUID as filmId,img_address as imgAddress,film_name as filmName,film_score as score from mtime_film_t where film_status != 2 ORDER BY score LIMIT 0,100
